channel.title: Bedrock on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bedrock on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: SmartFlat AI: Building AWS Multi-Agent System
item.description: This post explores how I built SmartFlat AI, a multi-agent system powered by AWS Bedrock AgentCore and Amazon Nova Lite to analyze Singapore’s HDB resale data. By combining Athena, RDS Aurora, and Lambda in a cost-optimized, serverless design, the system intelligently routes queries to the most efficient backend—balancing cost, performance, and scalability. The result is an intelligent, modular AI architecture for real-world housing analytics.

item.title: ATS Buddy: Privacy-First Resume AI
item.description: ATS Buddy is an AI-powered resume analysis tool built with AWS Bedrock, Textract, and Comprehend. Designed with a privacy-first approach, it redacts PII before analysis, helping job seekers optimize resumes without exposing personal data. With S3, DynamoDB caching, and serverless workflows, ATS Buddy delivers secure, cost-efficient resume insights—built hackathon-ready.
